ServerBlobCreator

public ServerBlobCreator(org.akubraproject.BlobStoreConnection con,
                         long estimatedSize,
                         Map<String,String> hints,
                         Exporter exporter)
                  throws IOException
Creates a new ServerBlobCreator object.

Parameters:
con - the server side blob store connection
estimatedSize - the size estimate on the new blob from client
hints - the blob creation hints from client
exporter - the exporter to use
Throws:
IOException - on an error in creation
Method Detail

shutDown

public RemoteBlob shutDown(boolean abort)
                    throws IOException
Description copied from interface: RemoteBlobCreator
Shuts down this blob-creator and gets the Blob that was created. Note that if this is not an abortive shutdown, this call will block till RemoteOutputStream.close() has been called. Also note that the server side will un-export this object at the end of this call.

Specified by:
shutDown in interface RemoteBlobCreator
Parameters:
abort - if set to true, all attempts are made to abort the blob creation
Returns:
the remote blob handle
Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in rmi transport
IOException - error reported by the remote server
